  • Method Details

    • loadAppointmentsFromCSV

      public List<Appointment> loadAppointmentsFromCSV(List<AppointmentSlot> slots, List<Patient> patients)
      Reads appointments from a CSV file and creates Appointment objects.
      Parameters:
      slots - List of AppointmentSlot objects to match against.
      patients - List of Patient objects to match against.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects read from the CSV.

    • updateAppointmentStatus

      public boolean updateAppointmentStatus(String appointmentID, String newStatus)
      Updates the status of an appointment in the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to update.
      newStatus - The new status to set for the appointment.
      Returns:
      True if the status was updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • scheduleAppointment

      public static void scheduleAppointment(List<AppointmentSlot> slots, String patientID, String doctorID, String dateOfChoice, String startTime, String endTime)
      Schedules a new appointment by finding an available slot, updating the booking status, and writing the appointment details to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      slots - List of available appointment slots.
      patientID - The ID of the patient scheduling the appointment.
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor for the appointment.
      dateOfChoice - The desired date of the appointment.
      startTime - The start time for the appointment.
      endTime - The end time for the appointment.

    • cancelAppointment

      public static void cancelAppointment(String patientID, String appointmentID)
      Cancels an appointment by updating its status and updating the corresponding appointment slot.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient who wants to cancel the appointment.
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to cancel.
